items.summary: Update the centralized landing page image path module (frontend/src/constants/landingImages.ts) to use the user-provided GitHub raw image URLs instead of the current /assets/uploads/* paths, mapping each URL to the correct LANDING_IMAGES key (hero, solution, benefitsStrip1, benefitsStrip2, ingredients, testimonials, strongCta).

Ensure all landing page sections continue to render their images exclusively via imports from LANDING_IMAGES so that the new URLs are used everywhere the landing page shows images (Hero, Solution, Benefits image strip, Ingredients, Testimonials supporting image, Strong CTA).
